title: Active Exploits Hit Dassault and XWiki — CISA Confirms Critical Flaws Under Attack
description: Threat actors are actively exploiting multiple security flaws impacting Dassault Systèmes DELMIA Apriso and XWiki, according to alerts issued by the U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) and VulnCheck.
